attributes.action: make it compulsory for dog owners to get a licence and ban people under 21 from owning a dog
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
people under 21 should not be allowed to own a dog, or make it compulsory for every dog owner to have a licence before getting a dog

there's too many stray and mistreated dogs on our streets as it is, more people should be prosecuted for cruelty and neglect and everyone had a licence it would be easeier to identify the culprits

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
